Articles.Content:
I want to introduce myself. I`m new to forum but playing KSP since 0.22. I`m actually realy bad at this game. but i love it. I fell in love with KSP, when i saw someone circularizing his orbit in a let`s play video. Maybe it`s not a big deal, but the fact that the increasing tangential velocity raises the orbit in the opposite side was very astounding to me. I haven`t thoght about that before. At that moment i`ve realized how awesome this game is. Before this moment i`ve always thought that KSP is about financial management of a space program. Of course later i`ve discovered some other awesome things about this game...

I`m joining this forum, to learn more about ksp and maybe to help someone, if i can. So few other things about me. I`m playing this game on a low speed laptop, so i have many problems. But i don`t mind. I would love to play KSP stock, but there is many things that must be implemented in stock game. So i`m using mods such as alarm clock, KER, FAR, DRE, Procedural parts, fairings, and navigation utilities.

I wish you all best of luck in missions

Hello nuralisoy. You said you are bad at the game? So is everybody else. The trick is to keep playing so that you crash closer and closer to your destination, until you make it there. Anyway, welcome to the forum.
